backend/main.mo: IC backend actor defining user profiles, transactions, expenses, reports, and authorization with CRUD logic using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the build-and-publish feature to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist detailing pre-build steps, build commands, post-deployment tests, PWA checks, and rollback plan.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, icons, manifest, root container, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first fetch, static asset caching, offline fallback, and cache versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routing, authentication gating, theme setup, React Query, and layout components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and caffeine.ai link with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, navigation menu, and user dropdown including profile display and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Shows a custom PWA install prompt using the beforeinstallprompt event and manages user dismissal state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a modal for firstâ€‘time users to enter their name and saves the profile via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Del: Provides a confirmation dialog to delete a transaction, showing key transaction details and calling a delete handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, transactions, reports, and expenses via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes plus print styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying daily and monthly sales/expense summaries with charts and statistic cards, fetched via custom query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/KasirPage.tsx: Cashier page for adding products to a cart, validating payments, and submitting transactions with dynamic totals.
frontend/src/pages/LaporanPage.tsx: Reports page showing daily and monthly transaction data with filtering, printing, CSV export, and deletion support.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and basic app feature descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/PengeluaranPage.tsx: Expense management page for adding expenses and viewing monthly expense summaries with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, version info, and existing features for the current build state with no new feature requests.
